Package graph.packing

Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BBNodeComparatorIntf
    comparator for BBNodeBase objects.
    DBBNodeComparatorIntf
    comparator for DBBNode objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BBGASPPacker
    implements a hybrid parallel GASP-Branch & Bound heuristic scheme for the 1- or 2-packing problem in graphs.
    BBNode1
    represents a node in the B & B tree of the hybrid B & B - GASP scheme for the 1-packing problem (max weighted independent set problem).
    BBNode2
    represents a node in the B&B tree of the hybrid B&B - GASP scheme for the 2-packing problem.
    BBNodeBase
    represents a node in the B&B tree of the hybrid B&B - GASP scheme for packing problems.
    BBNodeComparator1
    Balanced comparator that mostly takes into account the bound-based estimate for the corresponding BB-node (resembling a Best-First Search), turning into Depth-First Search when the bound estimates are close to each other.
    BBNodeComparator1DFS
    Depth-First Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS).
    BBNodeComparator1LvlBndCstComb
    Level-dependent Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS).
    BBNodeComparator2
    This comparator is Depth-First-Search in spirit, and only differs from DFS when two solutions are "very similar", in which case, the bound of each soln will be the determinant factor in which soln is examined first.
    BBQueue
    Holds BBNodeBase objects to execute (to submit to the BBThreadPool).
    BBThreadPool
    wrapper for the parallel.FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor class.
    BBTree
    represents the Branch&Bound Tree of the method.
    BoundedQueue
    Class maintains a queue of BBNodeBase objects of finite length.
    DBBGASPPacker
    implements a hybrid parallel-distributed GASP-Branch & Bound heuristic scheme for the 1-packing problem in graphs (Maximum Weighted Independent Set problem - MWIS).
    DBBNode0
    represents a node in the distributed B & B tree of the hybrid B & B - GASP scheme for the 1-packing problem (max weighted independent set problem with non-negative node weights), using bit-vectors as implemented in the class popt4jlib.BoolVector to represent the node-ids of the partial solution it contains.
    DBBNode0ComparatorDFS
    Depth-First Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS).
    DBBNode0ComparatorGWMIN2
    Best-First Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS) according to the GWMIN2 criterion, with a lex order in case of ties.
    DBBNode1
    represents a node in the distributed B & B tree of the hybrid B & B - GASP scheme for the 1-packing problem (max weighted independent set problem).
    DBBNode12
    represents a node in the distributed B & B tree of the hybrid B & B - GASP scheme for the 1-packing problem (max weighted independent set problem).
    DBBNode1ComparatorDFS
    Depth-First Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS).
    DBBNodeBase
    represents a node in the distributed (cluster parallel) version of the B&B tree of the hybrid B&B - GASP scheme for packing problems.
    DBBNodeComparator1LvlBndCstComb
    Level-dependent Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS).
    DBBTree
    singleton class represents the Branch&Bound Tree of the distributed version of the BB-GASP method for MWIS.
    DefBBNodeComparator
    an implementation of the BBNodeComparatorIntf.
    DefDBBNodeComparator
    Default implementation of the DBBNodeComparatorIntf uses the bound of the solution, & breaks ties according to the node-ids of the solutions compared.
    GASPPacker
    Implements a GRASP algorithm for the 2-packing problem where however, there is always a "best" free node to select from whenever the set of free nodes is non-empty, thus the name "GASP" instead of "GRASP".
    GraphPackingEvalFunction
    evaluates sets of Node objects for feasibility as k-packing solutions, and returns minus the number of nodes in the solution as long as the solution is feasible, or Double.MAX_VALUE in case of an infeasible solution.
    GRASPPacker
    Implements a fast GRASP algorithm for the 1- or 2-packing problem, well-known combinatorial optimization problems.
    GRASPPacker1
    Implements a fast GRASP algorithm for the 1-packing problem, well-known MWIS combinatorial optimization problems.
    GRASPPacker1SingleMoveMaker
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf interface for use with the Maximum Weighted Independent Set (MWIS) problem solver DBBGASPPacker.
    GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter
    implements a filter applicable to local search in GRASP approaches for the 2-packing problem, as implemented in the popt4jlib.LocalSearch.DLS class.
    GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter2
    implements a filter applicable to local search in GRASP approaches for the 1- or 2-packing problem, as implemented in the popt4jlib.LocalSearch.DLS class.
    GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter3
    implements a filter applicable to local search in GRASP approaches for the 1- or 2-packing problem, as implemented in the popt4jlib.LocalSearch.DLS class.
    IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{-1+P} neighborhood of ints: a set of integers S1 is a neighbor of another set S, if S1 is the result of subtracting one member of S, and then augmenting S by as many integers as possible without violating feasibility of the solution.
    IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerMT
    Multi-threaded version of the IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker class.
    IntSetN21GraphAllMovesMaker
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{2+1} neighborhood of ints: read the documentation of its super-classes for a detailed explanation.
    IntSetN2RXPAllImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerFaster
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{-2+P} neighborhood of ints: a set of integers S1 is a neighbor of another set S, if S1 is the result of subtracting two members of S, and then augmenting S by as many integers as possible without violating feasibility of the solution.
    IntSetN2RXPAllImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerFaster.BVI
    auxiliary helper class used for sorting.
    IntSetN2RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{-2+P} neighborhood of ints: a set of integers S1 is a neighbor of another set S, if S1 is the result of subtracting two members of S, and then augmenting S by as many integers as possible without violating feasibility of the solution.
    IntSetN2RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerFaster
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{-2+P} neighborhood of ints: a set of integers S1 is a neighbor of another set S, if S1 is the result of subtracting two members of S, and then augmenting S by as many integers as possible without violating feasibility of the solution.
    IntSetN2RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerFaster.BVI
    auxiliary helper class used for sorting.
    IntSetN2RXPGraphAllMovesMaker
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{-2+P} neighborhood of ints: a set of integers S1 is a neighbor of another set S, if S1 is the result of subtracting two members of S, and then augmenting S by as many integers as possible without violating feasibility of the solution.
    ISN2RXPFIGAMMTest
    Test driver class for the IntSetN2RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker class.
    MLGRASPPacker1
    Implements a fast Multi-Level GRASP algorithm for the 1-packing problem, well-known as the MWIS combinatorial optimization problem.
    MWISEvaluator
    class allows the evaluation of a solution to the MWIS problem contained in a file ("sol.out") for a graph.
    NodeComparator
    auxiliary class comparing graph.Node objects, for use with the graph.packing.GASPPacker class, not part of the public API.
    NodeComparator_4
    auxiliary class comparing graph.Node objects, for use with the graph.packing.GRASPPacker class, not part of the public API.
    NodeComparator2
    auxiliary class comparing graph.Node objects, for use with the graph.packing.GRASPPacker class, not part of the public API.
    NodeComparator3
    auxiliary class comparing graph.Node objects, for use with the graph.packing.GRASPPacker class, not part of the public API.
    NodeComparator4
    auxiliary class comparing graph.Node objects, for use with the graph.packing.GRASPPacker class, not part of the public API.
    NodeSetWeightComparator
    Comparator will sort Set<Node> objects according to their total weight in descending order (heaviest weight first).
    NodeSetWeightComparatorBV
    Comparator will sort BoolVector objects according to their total weight in descending order (heaviest weight first).
    PDAInitDBBTreeCmd
    auxiliary class NOT used for the initialization of distributed PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk objects running code for the distributed version of the BBGASPPacker.
    PDAsynchInitDBBTreeCmd
    auxiliary class used for the initialization of distributed PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk objects running code for the distributed version of the BBGASPPacker.
    SetSizeEvalFunction
    Evaluates the size of the set-argument and returns its negative.
    SetWeightEvalFunction
    Evaluates the total weight of the nodes whose ids are in the set-argument and returns its negative.
    SSNode
    A class implementing the Self-Stabilizing algorithm for finding a maximal 2-packing in a graph.
    SSNodeData
    auxiliary class that holds the data for the SSNode class, not part of the public API.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PackingException
    Class used to indicate exceptions in the packing package!.

Package graph.packing Description

Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.

Package Specification

Parallel solver that implements a Branch & Bound procedure embedded in a GASP framework (Greedy Adaptive Search Procedure). Local Search is also implemented as part of the standard GRASP procedure (as subclasses of the popt4jlib.LocalSearch package interfaces but the only neighborhoods that can improve upon the solution found by "GRASP without local search" are very time consuming procedures.
  • hyperlink

Related Documentation

S. Vasillaras & I.T. Christou, "On the Optimal Capacity of Mobile Ad-hoc Networks with Finite Nodes", PIMRC 2011, Toronto, Canada.

I.T. Christou & S. Vasillaras, "A Parallel Hybrid Branch & Bound GRASP Heuristic for the D2EMIS Problem", Computers & Operations Research, 2013, 40(10):2387-2397.
